metadata.title: CVE-2024-49920 on Ubuntu 16.04 LTS (xenial) - medium
metadata.description: In the Linux kernel, the following vulnerability has been resolved:drm/amd/display: Check null pointers before multiple uses[WHAT & HOW]Poniters, such as stream_enc and dc->bw_vbios, are null checked previouslyin the same function, so Coverity warns "implies that stream_enc anddc->bw_vbios might be null". They are used multiple times in thesubsequent code and need to be checked.This fixes 10 FORWARD_NULL issues reported by Coverity.

criterions.comment: linux package in xenial is affected and may need fixing.
